name: The Last Cactus (homunculusgames)
description:
Keep your buddy Cactus alive by giving him water! Slay enemies to get water and feed the Cactus.

CONTROLS:

Mouse + Keyboard

  •  ASWD - Move
  •  Space - Jump 
  • Left Click - Shoot 
  • Right Click - Melee
  • Q - Water
  • Shift - Roll

Controller

  • A - Jump
  • X - Shoot
  • Y - Melee Attack
  • B - Roll
  • LB - Water
